title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 06 November 2015 - XWiki
content:
<OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
00:26 <OSIMasson> has quit  
01:06 <woshilapin> has quit  
01:21 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
01:21 <sorinello> has quit  
01:37 <vmassol1> has quit  
05:46 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
07:43 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
07:48 <sorinello> has quit  
07:50 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
08:36 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
08:49 <woshilapin> has quit  
09:00 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
09:13 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
09:38 <mflorea> has quit  
09:57 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:57 <cthiel> good day, would it be possible to put a LICENSE into github.com/xwiki/\* repositories, to refelect what's in http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/License?  
11:14 <tmortagne> cthiel: license is embedded at build time in pretty much everything but indeed it might be cleaner to also put it at the root of each repository  
11:14 <tmortagne> (right now it's in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-commons/blob/master/xwiki-commons-tools/xwiki-commons-tool-license-resources/src/main/resources/META-INF/LICENSE.vm)  
11:15 <tmortagne> would be great if you could create an issue on jira.xwiki.org so that we don't forget, I won't have time to take care of that today probably  
11:16 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
11:17 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
11:26 <cthiel> tmortagne: will do  
11:26 <tmortagne> thanks  
11:29 <cjd> XWIKI-9285  
11:31 <Ramona1> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <cthiel> XWIKI-12779  
11:49 <ClemensR> thanks  
12:33 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
13:09 <ClemensR> has quit  
13:39 <tmortagne> mflorea: I'm done with http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-12771  
13:39 <tmortagne> (at last)  
15:17 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
15:33 <sorinello> has quit  
15:38 <mflorea> tmortagne: are you handling the XarExtensionHandlerTest failures?  
15:38 <tmortagne> yes  
15:38 <mflorea> there is also testLogAsLDAPUser  
15:38 <mflorea> ok, thanks  
15:38 <mflorea> I'm checking createPagesFromTemplate  
15:38 <tmortagne> I was hopping my last commits would fix it but looks like we hit some Mockito multithread limitation...  
16:28 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
16:28 <sorinello> has quit  
16:37 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki  
16:50 <vmassol1> tmortagne: so now that Mokcitoldcore is a spy does it meanthat everyone using it need to change their code?  
16:50 <vmassol1> I see for ex that you changed WebRestTest because of the change  
16:51 <tmortagne> vmassol1: I changed the method to make it extra clear so in pratice if you manipulate the XWiki instance you need to change you code yes  
16:51 <vmassol1> hmm that might be a lot of people affected  
16:54 <cjd> has quit  
16:59 <OSIMasson> has quit  
16:59 <mflorea> tmortagne: many XWikiLDAPAuth... tests are failing in platform now  
17:00 <tmortagne> checking, I was looking at platform\_quality build  
17:05 <tmortagne> mflorea: should be better now  
17:05 <mflorea> great, thanks  
17:13 <ClemensR> it seems the PDF Macro http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/PDF+Macro no longer works with XWiki 7.x (or, for the matter 6.x). Not sure what broke it ...  
17:14 <tmortagne> ClemensR: should probably create an issue for a possible regression  
17:14 <ClemensR> just wondering if anyone can reproduce  
17:14 <ClemensR> I will investigate a bit more and create an issue if I have found the cause  
17:40 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
17:41 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
17:41 <flashdel> has quit  
17:52 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
18:01 <Ramona1> has quit  
18:04 <OSIMasson> has quit  
18:12 <ClemensR> it is a "wanted regression" with the PDF Macro: attachment.download.whitelist  must contain application/pdf for the macro to work  
18:13 <Pbas> has quit  
18:13 <ClemensR> I will try to see if I can update the macro to display a warning if this is not the case, and update the docs on e.x.o  
18:18 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
18:29 <tmortagne> mflorea: the remaining LDAPAuthTest.testLogAsLDAPUser is more or less a flickering, for some reason ViewPage.login() does not leas to login page but when I debug it step by step it behave as expected  
18:29 <tmortagne> I will try to work on it but it's not a blocker for the release  
18:30 <mflorea> ok, thanks  
18:47 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
18:49 <tmortagne> has left #xwiki

21:07 <vmassol1> has joined #xwiki

21:41 <Ramona> has quit  
22:03 <thisismatt> has joined #xwiki  
22:06 <thisismatt> my xwiki install does not currently send "forgot password" emails. The queue on the "Mail Sending Status" page is empty, which lead me to believe that the messages were sent. But I don't know where to look for logs and the logging configuration page of the admin panel has 1372 parameters and no search. Can you guys point me to how to troubleshoot mail issues? Thanks!  
22:14 <woshilapin> has quit  
22:44 <thisismatt> has quit  
23:32 <OSIMasson> has left #xwiki  
23:58 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki
